H0.text: Which Brit broke the land speed record in 1990 in Thrust 2. Andy Green

H1.text: Which Brit broke the land speed record in 1990 in Thrust 2. Colin Fallows

H2.text: Which Brit broke the land speed record in 1990 in Thrust 2. Glynne Bowsher

H3.text: Which Brit broke the land speed record in 1990 in Thrust 2. Richard Noble

A4.text: Richard Noble stepped up to 'bring back this record for Britain'.
